message: In this quest, the battle you fight will depend on the choices you make during the scenario.

In this quest, the battle you fight will depend on the choices you make during the scenario.
In addition, you will form your party immediately before the battle begins.

"The Adventure of Singing Pumpkin Castle" is a revival event.
If you have obtained a "Holy Grail" in a past "The Adventure of Singing Pumpkin Castle" event, it will be replaced with a "Crystallized Lore" for the revival.

CAUTION

"Door of Void: The Arrival of Seven Sins" is a quest that can be repeated multiple times. However, bond points, EXP, battle drops, and clear rewards can only be claimed once.

Warning:

"Cage of the Fallen" is not located anywhere within SE.RA.PH, and it's a High Difficulty side dungeon.
This dungeon is not a part of the Event Missions.

Would you like to proceed?

In this quest, you will form your party immediately before the battle begins.

Would you like to start the quest?

Warning:

[Ultra High Difficulty] Rematch at Reichenbach Falls is a repeatable quest. However, Bond Points, EXP, battle drops, and clear rewards can only be claimed the first time it is cleared.

Do you still wish to proceed?
The path splits in two. Which way to go...?[k]
There's a chilly presence. Something's coming...![k]
The moment you enter the room, a giant lizard slithers out![k]
There's a warm presence.[k]
The floor is nice and warm and cozy.[k]
Maidservants are waiting inside the room![k]
The pillar looks like it has scratch marks.[k]
There's animal fur on the floor.[k]
Howling can be heard from inside the room.[k]
A chimera is sitting inside the room looking cramped![k]
Something jolly seems to be inside the room.[k]
A giggling sound can be heard from the corridor.[k]
Lots of laughter can be heard from inside the room.[k]
Lots of maidservants are sitting inside the room![k]
There's a sweet scent.[k]
An eerie-sounding moan can be heard through the wall. Is there something behind it?[k]
After sliding open the fusuma, maidservants come out and start pressing themselves against you.[k]
You're surrounded by maidservants![k]
The sound of the shamisen can be heard.[k]
The sound of the shamisen echoes throughout the corridor, making it sound like chamber music.[k]
The sound of the shamisen abruptly stops the moment you stand in front of the room.[k]
The maidservants carrying shamisen suddenly ambush you![k]
The floor creaks as you walk. It seems to be old and damaged.[k]
There are footprints of something big and heavy passing by...[k]
A giant apparition was hiding at the end of the corridor![k]
It's a grandiose-looking fusuma that seems meant to receive important guests.[k]
A slew of maidservants are lined up inside the spacious room![k]
A loud moaning sound can be heard from the room ahead...[k]
The area is eerily quiet...[k]
It's so quiet, the sound of your footsteps is deafening...[k]
As if cutting through the silence, the sound of flapping wings can be heard from the corridor.[k]
Whoa, it's a wyvern![k]
It's dark, and you can't see ahead. Watch your step.[k]
After walking through the dark for so long, the room's light is blinding.[k]
After reaching the room without issue, you open the door without hesitation...and a wolf lunges at you![k]
The air feels heavy in this corridor...could it be smoke? It does look dark and black...[k]
This smoke seems choked with evil...it's hard to breathe...[k]
It's a runaway horse![k]
The floorboards are covered in patches of mold. Revolting.[k]
There are scurrying sounds coming from the ceiling... Could it be mice?[k]
The ceiling suddenly collapses, and a giant lizard falls through![k]
It's not cold...and yet there is a chill in the air.[k]
You're getting goosebumps. Maybe it's the strange chill in the corridor...[k]
Your body's trembling. Let's get out of here quick.[k]
You try to jog through the corridor, but a pale monster crawls out of a crack in the wall![k]
The wall is heavily damaged. It looks like a serious fight happened here...[k]
There are small and big scratches...[k]
A wolf carcass was lying on the side of corridor...but then a chimera appeared behind you![k]
A loud moaning sound can be heard from the room ahead...[k]
This corridor is magnificently crafted. You just want to admire it forever.[k]
The gold decoration on the fusuma is elegant and beautiful. Could this room be for someone [sr]important?[k]
The fusuma has been violently shredded.[k]
Sounds of clicking metal, like scissors, can be heard from inside the room.[k]
Inside the room, you find an empty hermit crab shell. But you swear something living was in the room a minute ago...[k]
The area is covered with slimy mucus.[k]
The mucus looks like it's flowing out of the room.[k]
There's an octopus jar...but it's empty.[k]
The floorboards seem to be rotted. It's dangerous because some areas are caved in.[k]
The floorboards are blistered, as if they've been melted by something. It looks like...a poisonous liquid.[k]
A squirming, writhing sound issues from within the room.[k]
A giant poison-spewing snake made a nest inside the room![k]
This corridor has a springiness that feels just right to the step.[k]
There's nobody inside the room, but there is something that looks like a bird's nest...[k]
You open the door and a big chicken rushes at you, snapping at your neck![k]
There's an inexplicably foul odor wafting through...[k]
It appears to be an intense smell of a beast...[k]
A fierce beast was kept inside the room![k]
A shiny, mirrored corridor. How much polish did it take to make it so shiny?[k]
It's so shiny, it's blinding. Let's be careful not to slip.[k]
Light floods out of the room...what in the world...?[k]
The room was full of maidservants in flashy outfits![k]
It looks like a newly restored corridor. The new wood smells nice.[k]
A big koi fish is painted on the fusuma.[k]
A long white line that looks like track markings is painted along the corridor. You feel compelled to run on it.[k]
You can't help but jog along the corridor. You don't want to lose this race![k]
Boars were cramped inside the room![k]
Is the floor slightly tilted? This corridor feels a bit unsettling.[k]
A screeching sound can be heard from inside the room.[k]
Monkeys were playing inside the room! Ooh ah ah!!![k]
This must be the last area of this floor! Let's hurry through.[k]
A familiar presence can be felt from inside the room... Now what could it be...[k]
The maidservants were redoing their makeup and waiting inside the room![k]
You're getting tired...but just a little more. Keep going.[k]
A sleepy growl can be heard from inside the room...[k]
A small arrow is drawn on the floor like it's leading the way.[k]
You follow the arrow and find even more arrows.[k]
The room's full of arrows.[k]
There's a line of arrows making a full circle around the room... Looks like it was just a prank.[k]
The door is really hard to open. But it's probably not just because it's jammed...[k]
You proceed by forcing the doors open with all your might...[k]
This particular door won't open no matter how hard you pull on it. Well, if pulling doesn't work...push it![k]
It's a dead end... Turn back and try a different route.[k]
It looks like a big door, but the actual entrance is the smaller door below.[k]
It's an ordeal just to reach the room, but it feels a little cramped with so much inside, too...[k]
There's a piece of paper that says "Treasure ahead."[k]
Drawn by the paper's message, you proceed and find another flyer that says "Treasure imminent."[k]
There was a treasure chest, but it was empty... But you find a Hanafuda Card nearby.[k]
There's a paper that says "Dead end ahead."[k]
You ignore the message and move on, and find another paper that says "Dead end. Really."[k]
There's a room up ahead. It doesn't seem like a dead end. The paper seemed to be lying.[k]
The room has only walls, and no exit. It appears to be a dead end.[k]
When you approach the wall and look closely, you find that there's a handle affixed to it.[k]
You pull the handle and the wall opens up. It appears the door was painted to look like a wall.[k]
There's a sign propped in front of a skeleton model that says "No entry."[k]
You ignore the sign and pass through, when suddenly the skeleton starts to move! You knew that was coming![k]
A cat statue beckons you with its paw. You can't refuse a cat's wishes.[k]
The cat's paw appears to be a switch. You press its paw, and a door opens.[k]
It was a dead end. And then the cat's paw beckons the skeleton![k]
There are rows of things that look like bottles of water. You hesitate to get near them.[k]
The bottles are neatly and beautifully lined up. Is there some sort of ritual going on...?[k]
Nothing happened. But it doesn't completely negate the possibility of these bottles having some sort of effect![k]
Perhaps there's going to be a banquet soon... Preparations for a reception are being made.[k]
The food looks really good... You can't stop drooling. Just a taste wouldn't hurt...[k]
A dragon tooth warrior appeared the instant you reached for the food! Was it...used as broth!?[k]
There are tables set, but the place is empty. You hesitate to go in...[k]
There's nobody here, but the place doesn't seem inviting. It's as if it's trying to repel potential visitors.[k]
It doesn't seem to be a dead end, so let's pass by real quick. This is no place for amateurs.[k]
All the doors are wide open, as if to say "come right in."[k]
It's big and spacious. It looks like you can just pass right through to the other side.[k]
As you cheerily traverse the room, a monster appears from under the tatami mat! Tatami Yokai Swallow Reversal!?[k]
The air is chilly. Ooohhhh, oooooohhh...[k]
Protective talismans paper the walls. There seems to be a presence here.[k]
The stains on the walls all look like ghosts. Nooo...it's spooky...[k]
It seems...to have just been a vibe. Disappointing...[k]
A picture of paradise is painted on the fusuma.[k]
The room's interior is decorated with myriad flowers. Could this be...an offering?[k]
There's a coffin in the furthest room. As expected, a skeleton leaps out from within![k]
A picture of hell is painted on the fusuma.[k]
Skeletons are lying about the room.[k]
The room features what appears to be a giant, hellish cauldron. What's inside...is really not something you should concern yourself with.[k]
It seemed super dangerous, but you managed to proceed without incident.[k]
Chains are wrapped tightly around the door, but you were able to open it easily by sliding it to the side.[k]
A monster is chained up in the corner of the room...proceed with caution.[k]
Ah! You accidently trip on the chain and release the monster![k]
Strong gusts of wind were blowing from the back of the room, but you managed to avoid the wind and pass by crouching.[k]
A monster is coming at you from behind, but it's being pushed back by the strong wind.[k]
The monster also crouched down to pursue you! It's kind of smart![k]
There's a ton of futons arranged in the room. Could this the maidservants' bedroom?[k]
A maidservant(?) appears to be sleeping. Proceed carefully so as not to wake her up.[k]
You accidentally make some noise![k]
You open the door and an intense wave of heat flows out. It's so hot, you hesitate to go in![k]
There are a lot of lanterns in the room, and it feels like a sauna in here.[k]
You sweat so profusely, you might've lost some weight![k]
Seat cushions are lined up neatly in the room.[k]
Is this a place where people come and sit to watch a show?[k]
You tried to sit on a seat cushion, but then a warrior appeared from beneath it![k]
When you open the door, a folding screen appears in the doorway.[k]
Behind the folding screen was another folding screen, and you can't see beyond that. It's like a folding screen maze.[k]
You realize you could just knock down the folding screen! You easily get through.[k]
When you open the door, a wardrobe appears in the doorway.[k]
You can't push down a wardrobe...[k]
You realize you could just jump on top of the wardrobe and keep going! You easily get through.[k]
The warriors did not tolerate cheating of that sort![k]
There's a sign that says "It's safe here." Very suspicious...[k]
There's a sign that says "Please make yourself at home." There's no way you could do that![k]
You relax since the opportunity arose, but then you are surrounded by warriors![k]
There's a sign that says "This place is unremarkable." Very suspicious...[k]
This place really is unremarkable... REALLY normal...[k]
A ghost attacks unremarkably! It's so normal![k]
There's a sign that says "This place is dangerous." Very suspicious...[k]
A lizard suddenly jumps out from the wall, but it's unlikely to hit you because it's so tiny.[k]
There looks to be a pitfall, but it's so obvious that you avoid it easily.[k]
A ball falls from the ceiling, but it was made of rubber.[k]
This room feels really artificial.[k]
The door did not have any knobs to open it, but it opened by pushing it.[k]
You manage to proceed through in the same manner.[k]
Carp streamers festively adorn the room.[k]
There's no wind, yet the pinwheel is rotating.[k]
The May festival dolls begin moving, then...attack![k]
Every time you step on a tatami mat, it shifts along the floor... It's like those puzzles in video games![k]
Some tatami mats take you back, but you should be able to proceed if you keep jumping on mats that go forward.[k]
It feels like you're going in circles...[k]
You managed to solve the puzzle and get through.[k]
A groan can be heard from the next room...[k]
